alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 10:20AM EDT until June 19 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Suwannee County in northern Florida... Hamilton County in northern Florida... * Until 1100 AM EDT. * At 1020 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles southwest of Lake Park to near Madison to 10 miles southeast of Monticello, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Live Oak, Jasper, Jennings, Suwannee Springs, Suwannee River State Park, Blue Springs and Crossroads. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
